original_text: You will eat the flesh of mighty men and drink the blood of the princes of the earth as if they were rams and lambs, goats and bulls—all of them fattened animals from Bashan.
korean_text: 너희가 용사의 살을 먹으며 세상 왕들의 피를 마시기를 바산의 살진 짐승 곧 숫양이나 어린 양이나 염소나 수송아지를 먹듯 할지라

sentences.original_text: You will eat the flesh of mighty men
and drink the blood of the princes of the earth
as if they were rams and lambs
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 그들이 숫양과 어린 양인 것처럼

sentences.original_text: all of them fattened animals from Bashan
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 모두 바산에서 기른 살찐 짐승들인 것처럼
